DOC.brief_summary: To validate new methodology , name Retinal Leakage Analysis ( RLA ) , map human Blood-Retinal Barrier ( BRB ) function , clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Validation New Methodology Mapping Human Blood-Retinal Barrier Function
